channel.title: CVE Feed for PickPlugins -- Product Designer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PickPlugins -- Product Designer

item.title: CVE-2024-3608|2024-08-01T20:12:08.059Z -- pickplugins -- product%20designer
item.description: The Product Designer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the product_designer_ajax_delete_attach_id() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.33. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to delete arbitrary attachments.

item.title: CVE-2024-3608|2024-07-10T21:17:23.322Z -- pickplugins -- product%20designer
item.description: The Product Designer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the product_designer_ajax_delete_attach_id() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.33. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to delete arbitrary attachments.

item.title: CVE-2024-31277|2024-04-07T17:24:01.823Z -- pickplugins -- product%20designer
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in PickPlugins Product Designer.This issue affects Product Designer: from n/a through 1.0.32.
